<h3 id="X38171">X(38171) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(5), X(7), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b+c)*a^5-(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a^4-6*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+2*(2*b^2-b*c+2*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+4*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38171) = 5*X(2)-X(21168) = X(5)+2*X(142) = 2*X(5)+X(31657) = X(7)+5*X(1656) = X(9)-4*X(3628) = 2*X(140)+X(5805) = 2*X(140)-5*X(20195) = 4*X(142)-X(31657) = 4*X(142)+X(38139) = X(144)-13*X(5067) = X(5805)+5*X(20195) = 5*X(20195)-X(21153) = X(21168)+5*X(38107) = 2*X(21168)-5*X(38113) = 2*X(38041)+X(38175) = X(38043)+2*X(38172) = 3*X(38093)-X(38122) = 3*X(38093)+X(38150) = 2*X(38107)+X(38113) = 2*X(38111)+X(38139)</b>
<p>X(38171) lies on these lines: {2,5762}, {5,142}, {7,1656}, {9,3628}, {30,38093}, {140,5805}, {144,5067}, {381,21151}, {516,549}, {517,38204}, {518,38041}, {527,15699}, {528,38022}, {546,5732}, {547,5843}, {550,18482}, {631,27355}, {632,31658}, {946,33575}, {952,38053}, {1001,6924}, {2550,5901}, {2801,38182}, {3090,5779}, {3526,5759}, {3545,38065}, {3564,38186}, {3817,10156}, {3826,3918}, {3850,31672}, {3851,36991}, {5054,38073}, {5055,5817}, {5056,36996}, {5070,18230}, {5542,9956}, {5587,38030}, {5603,38121}, {5735,16239}, {5790,11038}, {5844,38200}, {5845,38166}, {5850,10172}, {5851,38180}, {5852,38181}, {5853,10283}, {5856,38173}, {5857,38174}, {5886,38052}, {6147,21617}, {6172,15703}, {6858,30275}, {6887,8732}, {7679,38055}, {8227,24644}, {8581,10592}, {10165,38151}, {10175,38054}, {10246,38149}, {10516,38115}, {10593,14100}, {10861,17530}, {16417,34474}, {18493,35514}, {26446,38036}</p>
<p>
X(38171) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 38107}, {5, 38111}, {381, 21151}, {549, 38137}, {3545, 38065}, {3817, 38123}, {5054, 38073}, {5587, 38030}, {5603, 38121}, {5790, 11038}, {5805, 21153}, {5886, 38052}, {6173, 38108}, {10165, 38151}, {10175, 38054}, {10246, 38149}, {10283, 38170}, {10516, 38115}, {11230, 38172}, {15699, 38080}, {26446, 38036}, {31657, 38139}, {38041, 38042}, {38122, 38150}<br>
X(38171) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21153, 140), (31657, 38111), (38043, 11230), (38082, 15699), (38108, 547), (38111, 142), (38113, 2), (38139, 5), (38175, 38042), (38179, 10172)<br>
X(38171) = center of Vu pedal-centroidal circle of X(7)<br>
X(38171) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 142, 31657), (3826, 20330, 5690), (5805, 20195, 140), (38093, 38150, 38122), (38205, 38206, 38053)<br>
</p>
